Name: maximize_project_budget
Description: Maximize the total budget allocated to all projects

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize the implementation of high-priority features

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required to complete all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the number of story points completed per sprint

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the development teams

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the impact of impediments by focusing on high-severity blockers first

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the self-reported satisfaction of the team

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Ensure features important to influential stakeholders are prioritized

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the time-to-market by reducing project duration

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the available working time of all workers

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieved sprint goals

Name: minimize_unassigned_tasks
Description: Minimize the number of tasks that are not assigned to any user story or sprint
